constituent: lass, woman, grass skirt, top hat, eight, six, animal legs, celery, scarf
koohiiStory1: Conversation at a party: A: "Who is that lass?" B: "Which one?" A: "The woman wearing the grass skirt." B: "Alas, I don´t know".
koohiiStory2: Two Irishmen visit Hawaii and see a woman wearing a grass skirt and nothing else. "That´s some lassie," says one to the other. "But alass Danny Boy, you can´t be bringing her home.".
words:
嬢(じょう): young woman
お嬢さん(おじょうさん): daughter (polite)
